title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 3
itunes:title: The Favorites - Best Bets NFL Week 3
description:
There are a number of tantalizing spots to bet across the NFL this week, but Action Network hosts Chad Millman and Simon Hunter must narrow down their top plays as Sunday looms. Together they select their Big Balls Bet of the Week, make a survivor play, plus a few other sides they're targeting for the weekend. #Herd #ColinCowherd

#Volume
